name: Costanera of Posadas
description: A beautiful riverside walk along the Paraná River, ideal for cycling, walking, and enjoying sunsets.

name: San Roque González de Santa Cruz Bridge
description: An impressive bridge connecting Posadas, Argentina, with Encarnación, Paraguay, offering scenic views of the river.

name: Andrés Guacurarí Statue
description: A large bronze monument honoring the local hero Andrés Guacurarí, located on the Costanera Avenue.

name: Parque del Conocimiento
description: A modern cultural complex with a library, science center, and theater, promoting art and technology.

name: Alberto Roth Botanical Garden
address: Av. Balcarce & Costanera, Posadas, Misiones, Argentina
description: A natural park with native flora and fauna, perfect for ecological walks and environmental education.

name: Palacio del Mate Museum
description: Also known as Lucas Braulio Areco Museum, it showcases regional art and cultural exhibitions.

name: Juan Yaparí Provincial Museum of Fine Arts
description: Houses painting, drawing and engraving collections, along with rotating exhibitions and cultural events.

name: Posadas Waterfront Park
description: A popular meeting place along the river with playgrounds, food stands, and green areas for relaxation.
